sourcesContent:
Weather forecast

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

{{encodedResult}}

Loading...

Date Temp. (C) Temp. (F) Summary
{{ forecast.date }} {{ forecast.temperatureC }} {{ forecast.temperatureF }} {{ forecast.summary }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient, HttpDownloadProgressEvent, HttpEventType, HttpHeaders, HttpRequest } from '@angular/common/http'; import { concatMap } from 'rxjs/internal/operators/concatMap'; import { of } from 'rxjs/internal/observable/of'; import { map } from 'rxjs/internal/operators/map'; import { last, tap } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public forecasts: WeatherForecast[] = []; public encodedResult: string | undefined = ''; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); this.getEncodedStreamed(); //http.get('https://localhost:7141/Encoder/EncodeBase64?textToEncode=abcde').pipe( // concatMap((data) => of(data)) //) //.subscribe((response) => console.log('response', response)); //http.get('https://localhost:7141/Encoder/EncodeBase64?textToEncode=abcde') // .subscribe((response) => console.log('response', response)); //const req = new HttpRequest('GET', 'https://localhost:7141/Encoder/EncodeBase64?textToEncode=abcde',"", { reportProgress: true }); //http.request(req).pipe( // map(event => console.log(event)), // last() //).subscribe((response) => console.log('response', response)); //http.get('https://localhost:7141/Encoder/EncodeBase64?textToEncode=abcde') // .subscribe((response) => console.log('response', response)) //const options = { // headers: new HttpHeaders({ // Connection: 'keep-alive' // }), // reportProgress: true //}; //http.get('https://localhost:7141/stream/data', options) // .subscribe(res => { console.log(res) }); //const req = new HttpRequest( // 'GET', `https://localhost:7141/stream/data`, // { responseType: 'text', reportProgress: true } //); //http.request(req) // .pipe( // tap(event => { // switch (event.type) { // case HttpEventType.DownloadProgress: { // this.encodedResult = (event).partialText; // console.log(event); // } // } // return of(); // }) // ) // .subscribe( // res => console.log(res) //) // .pipe( // concatMap(event => { // console.log(event) // return of(); // }) //) } private async getEncodedStreamed(): Promise { const response = await fetch('https://localhost:7141/EncodeBase64?textToEncode=abcd', { allowHTTP1ForStreamingUpload: true, } as any); if (response.body == null) { throw new Error('Not possible in current scenario'); } const reader = response.body.getReader(); async function printStream() { const { done, value } = await reader.read(); if (done) { return; } const textDecoder = new TextDecoder(); const stringValue = textDecoder.decode(value); const trimmedValue = stringValue .replace('[{', '{') .replace('},', '}') .replace(',{', '{') .replace('}]', '}'); console.log(stringValue) await printStream(); } await printStream(); } } interface WeatherForecast { date: string; temperatureC: number; temperatureF: number; summary: string; }
